lines: !throw You are not a registered player! Please use `!e new_game` first.
!throw There is nothing for you to attack!

!say You deal **{plr_dmg}** damage!
It has **{nmy_rem}/{!tag {me} monster_max_hp}** HP remaining.

!say _ _
The {!data monster {!tag {me} monster} params emoji} {!data monster {!tag {me} monster} title} deals **{nmy_dmg}** damage!
You have **{plr_rem}/{!tag {me} max_hp}** HP remaining.
!say The {!data monster {!tag {me} monster} params emoji} {!data monster {!tag {me} monster} title} deals {nmy_dmg} damage! **You are dead!**
!say You may use `!e new_game` to try again.
!say The enemy's turn has been skipped!
!var gold {!r {!data monster {!tag {me} monster} meta min_gold} {!data monster {!tag {me} monster} meta max_gold}}
!foreach a b {!split , {!data monster {!tag {me} monster} meta loot}}
!var loot_name {!data item {loot_type} params emoji} {!data item {loot_type} title}
